entry.title: Ghost Crimes

entry.content:
The past haunts the present. Ghosts and spirits inhabit every corner of our world. For some, this is a thing of wonder and beauty. For others, this is another avenue for violence.

Star is a psychic medium who helps people talk to various ghosts and spirits to resolve conflicts between them. When crimes are done to ghosts, it's on Star to solve it.

GHOST CRIMES!

Â 

Cases:

Case 1: DOUBLE MURDER (Out September 1st)

Side Stories:

FARWELL. (Out Augist 25th)
